Package langModel

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LanguageModelInterface
    Interface LanguageModelInterface: interface to describe a language model.
    NgramCountsInterface
    Interface NgramCountsInterface: interface to build the counts of n-grams from a training corpus (to be used by a language model).
    VocabularyInterface
    Interface VocabularyInterface: interface to represent the vocabulary associated to a language model (it can be made of words or characters).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LaplaceLanguageModel
    Class LaplaceLanguageModel: class inheriting the class NaiveLanguageModel by creating a n-gram language model using a Laplace smoothing.
    MiscUtils
    Class MiscUtils: class containing miscellaneous functions to deal with files and directories.
    NaiveLanguageModel
    Class NaiveLanguageModel: class implementing the interface LanguageModelInterface by creating a naive language model, i.e. a n-gram language model with no smoothing.
    NgramCounts
    Class NgramCounts: class implementing the interface NgramCountsInterface.
    NgramUtils
    Class NgramUtils: class containing useful functions to deal with n-grams.
    Vocabulary
    Class Vocabulary: class implementing the interface VocabularyInterface.
